context: Hello! What kind of movies are you into?
i feel like watching something like Predator (1987) or Drive (2011) I like both of those
Okay, how about an older movie called Run (1991) ? It has the guy who played Dr. Dreamy on Grey's Anatomy, but his name is escaping me at the moment.
I have not seen it but it sounds great I'll put it on my to watch list I also enjoyed Deadpool (2016)
Also, if you like those types of movies, how about Reservoir Dogs (1992) ? I love Quentin.
I cant wait to see the second one I loved that movie
resp: Oh, Deadpool (2016) was great. I still want to see the 2nd one, too.

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of movie?

I love movies that are thrilling and full of action, as well as adventurous and futuristic. It's always a delight to discover unexpected films that cover all these genres. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I love discovering unexpected and delightful film choices. It's always exciting to find movies that are thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action, exciting and daring adventure, and futuristic and imaginative sci-fi with futuristic adventure. I hope the recommender can suggest something that fits all these genres!

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Blade Runner 2049 (2017)" for its thrilling action, adventurous storyline, and futuristic setting. Enjoy the ride!
Can you tell me more about "Blade Runner 2049 (2017)"? I'd love to know about the thrilling action, adventurous storyline, and futuristic setting in the movie.
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by the recommendation. I didn't expect "Blade Runner 2049" to cover all my preferred genres. I'll ask for more details about the movie before making a decision. The recommender seems to understand my love for unexpected and delightful film choices. I appreciate the effort.

context.content: "Blade Runner 2049 (2017)" is a visually stunning and immersive film set in a dystopian future. It features intense action sequences, a captivating and adventurous storyline, and a futuristic world filled with advanced technology and stunning visuals. The movie will keep you on the edge of your seat with its thrilling and action-packed scenes.
That sounds amazing! I'm really intrigued by the futuristic world and the intense action sequences in "Blade Runner 2049 (2017)." I can't wait to watch it. Thank you for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I love the futuristic setting and the promise of intense action in "Blade Runner 2049 (2017)." The adventurous storyline also sounds intriguing. The recommender did a great job understanding my preferences and recommending a movie that seems to cover all the genres I enjoy. I'm excited to watch it!

simulator_dialog.resp: Oh, Deadpool (2016) was great. I still want to see the 2nd one, too.
